description:
Internet Marketing 101 & Social Media Essentials @ iMarketer Training.

Are you just starting with internet marketing? Do you feel confused and don't know where to start? Maybe because SIMPLY... there are too many courses out there, too many gurus, and you don't know where to start, you don't even know which part of internet marketing is more important to you and to your business at this stage.

Is knowledge of social media is more important than SEO? Maybe perfectly knowing SEO and ignoring email marketing will hurt your business?

Perhaps, if you focus in one component you're missing out in another?

Ahhh....all these questions... All of us, 'INTERNET GURUS' have started exactly from where you are right now. Believe me! So...NOW... this is your time to make your very first step towards your progress...

You should know by now that at this age of digital phenomenon no marketing strategy is complete without online marketing component. So become iMarketer, take your first steps with this course. The course doesn't require you to have any previous experience and it is aimed at BEGINNER level. Here is the course content below.

Course Content:

  • Introduction to Digital Marketing 
  • Introduction to Search Engine Marketing
  • Social Media Marketing with Facebook and Twitter
  • Email Marketing
  • Career in Digital Marketing

The course explains step-by-step all the components of digital marketing, and how to develop successful campaigns with search engine marketing and email marketing, how to find new customers and clients by making connections online via social media tools.

You will also learn how to promote your products, increase sales, engage customers and drive site traffic using Facebook and Twitter.

If you follow the lessons and reach the point when you actually claim your both certificates (Udemy and iMarketer certifications), then...as a REWARD we will give you a huge discount for a bigger and more detailed course.

So, take your chance, hit the 'Start Learning Now' button and enroll to the course. After all, this is YOUR FUTURE, so what are you waiting for?

We have priced the course reasonably. So, that you can definitely take your chance.

Happy Learning!
title: First Steps in Digital Marketing
